casebody.data:
GOODWIN
v.
SMITH. No. 398P08-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Mr. Norman B. Smith, Greensboro, for Smith, Norman B. Wesley Goodwin, Greensboro, for Goodwin, Wesley Foust-Graham.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of October 2015 by Plaintiff to Correct Original Complaint:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
